SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Analyze AI implementation risks in healthcare diagnostics using the SINT framework with Generator + Critic (N=2) methodology and comprehensive feedback loops.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: The analysis must consider patient safety, diagnostic accuracy, ethical implications, and regulatory compliance. Roles: AI Systems Developer, Medical Ethics Specialist. The process must include detailed risk analysis, strict logical evaluation, and expert criticism and refinement.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Consultants: 1. AI Systems Developer: Focuses on technical implementation, algorithm accuracy, and system reliability. 2. Medical Ethics Specialist: Evaluates ethical implications, patient safety, and professional standards.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Generator + Critic (N=2) with comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: - All expert positions must include detailed risk analysis and technical evaluation. - The process must include comprehensive feedback loops for refinement. - Output must include specific examples of risks and mitigation strategies.
